inputs.text: clean technical workflow diagram, white background, modern flat infographic style, centered title 'OpenClaw VC P1 수집/승인 로직', Korean labels, high readability, clear arrows, balanced spacing. 2-lane layout: Lane A(VC 중앙 오케스트레이터), Lane B(스타트업 로컬 Gateway). Flow: 1 Telegram '/vc collect acme 7d' 2 parser+tenant lookup 3 gateway health 4 POST /manifest 5 shared-folder scan metadata 6 POST /artifact-content pull 7 filename classifier + OCR fallback 8 AES-256-GCM encrypted vault save 9 metadata json + sqlite records 10 auto verification checks(file exists, counts, sha, decrypt, db) 11 approval queue pending 12 Telegram approval notice 13 /vc approve or reject 14 approved only email dispatch + audit log. Policy notes: consent-based shared folder only, no full desktop capture in P1, approval-gated external send, tenant-isolated key/storage. rounded boxes, numbered step badges, green success path, amber pending, red reject path, crisp typography
